Returns results from a Dadoo SQL Query, using standardized columnar names

runDadooSQL()

Returns results from a SQL Query, using standardized columnar names

runItem() 

 select {$table}_id as sel_key, {$table}_name as sel_value from {$table}

name runItem

Returns results from a SQL Query, using standardized columnar names

runSQL(string $other) 

 select {$table}_id as sel_key, {$table}_name as sel_value from {$table}

name runSQL

Parameters

$other

string
  • FPO copy here

Returns string-match results from a SQL Query, using standardized columnar names, and a letter

runSQLAlpha(string $alpha) 

 select {$table}_id as sel_key, {$table}_name as sel_value from {$table}
    and LOWER(SUBSTRING({$table}_name FROM 1 FOR 1)) = LOWER('A')

name runSQLAlpha

Parameters

$alpha

string
  • String of item to search
